name: Terminus (itch) (Mathilde Conte)
description:
Only one of these two souls is worthy of entering the afterlife. The other is an imposter. Investigate each wagon, and decide who to send back to the limbos.

- Play as a merciful or ruthless controller in a life-or-death investigation!

- Discover colorful characters and stories and make choices with huge consequences!

Credits Game Designers

Mathilde CONTE

Rémi Yacine BERKANI

Clément COQUIDE
